item.title: kksou says:
item.description: Hi, You are using the old version of Google Search. Think Google recently stopped the old versions of their google search API. Please switch to the component/module that uses their Google Search CSE API. Component: googleSearch (CSE) component: http://www.kksou.com/php-gtk2/Joomla-Gadgets/googleSearch-CSE-component.php Module: googleSearch (CSE) module: http://www.kksou.com/php-gtk2/Joomla-Gadgets/googleSearch-CSE-module.php Regards, /kksou
item.dc:creator: kksou

item.title: andreaordodi says:
item.description: I had it working originally but it continues to show a blank page when it searches. I've put in our Google search engine code, installed the module and it's enabled. No idea. We are trying to go live this week so our temporary URL is http://ringtail.arvixe.com/~soumut/smha/ Any help would be appreciated.
item.dc:creator: andreaordodi
